data.title: Cheese Farmer Boy Turned Managerial GOAT: Carlo Ancelotti’s History
data.meta_description: It's hard to imagine a real football fan who isn't familiar with Carlo Ancelotti's Childhood Story, given his legendary status as one of the m
data.text:
A combative midfielder for Parma, AS Roma and AC Milan, he helped Roma win the 1983 Serie A title and four Italian Cups before joining AC Milan in 1986.

There, he added two more league championships, as well as back-to-back European Cup triumphs in 1989 and 1990.

Have you met Real Madrid Coach Carlo Ancelotti’s girlfriend? Perhaps no, not Luisa, his ex-wife and not Marine Cretu – his ex-girlfriend.

Ancelotti is currently dating a stunning blonde identified as Mariann Barrena McClay. Below is the stunning photo of his hot Canadian woman.

She loves Carlo very much because is fun to be with. Below is a photo of them attending the Oktoberfest (Oktoberfest is the world’s largest Volksfest, which is held annually in Munich, Bavaria, Germany).

Mariann Barrena McClay was born in Vancouver, Canada, to María Concepción Gutiérrez and Antonio Barrena. With an impressive academic background, she holds an MBA in Marketing from Thunderbird School of Global Management, an MBA in International Business, and a PhD in Finance from Cass Business School. Additionally, she earned a BBA in Business Administration from Simon Fraser University.

Before her marriage, Mariann worked as a consultant at Barclays Bank in London. It was during this time, in 2011, that she met Carlo Ancelotti, who was then managing Chelsea. Their relationship blossomed, and they married in Vancouver in July 2014.

Aw! They look so happy, and we don’t know whose baby she is holding at that time. It was their second marriage for both of them, and Mariann has a very pretty teenage daughter, Chloe McClay.

About Luisa, Carlo Ancelotti’s Ex-Wife:

Before her, Carlo was married to his wife Luisa for over two decades. When looking at their photo below, one thing is common. Carlo surely has an eye for beautiful women.

After splitting with Luisa, he dated gal Marina Cretu, who is 13 years younger than him. Ancelotti and his ex-wife Luisa Gibellini have two children: Davide, who is a Real Madrid fitness coach.

Just as Harry Redknapp, Steve Bruce and Zinedine Zidane have given their sons opportunities in football, Carlo Ancelotti has also done the same.

He once appointed his inexperienced son, Davide, as Bayern Munich’s assistant coach while he was at the Allianz Arena.

Carlo Ancelotti has a daughter named Katia, who is from his ex-wife. Below is a photo of lookalike Katia and her father.

Katia is his first child and daughter, born on the 18th of April, 1984. She got married in 2014 to her partner,
